title: How come Yasuo wind wall blocks Nidalee spears?

replies.body: ..It blocks all projectiles. Cant tell if noob or troll.

...... its a projectile, it "flies" through the air. Yasuo's wall blocks and destroys things that "fly" through the air. Following your logic why does his skill block any projectiles then? Im pretty sure a death ray from lux would hit a bit harder than a spear.
Fun fact: Lux's laser isn't a projectile and actually passes through the windwall.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q8NP7heH,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-07-27T22:42:50.128+0000)
>
> Fun fact: Lux's laser isn't a projectile and actually passes through the windwall.

? then why does it stop mine...
It doesn't block your Ult, Yasuo players just have a reflex to throw up Windwall whenever anything scary is coming.

It's actually kinda funny. One Yasuo tried to windwall a Illaoi tentacle smash. 

I bashed him face in so hard.

> [{quoted}](name=Tyrone Lannister,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q8NP7heH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-27T20:24:29.515+0000)
>
> -_- its a projectile.........

wind wall doesn't block kitty cat projectiles if you land the spear first XD

seriously though.. your spear has a 6 second cooldown at lvl 1. it may be your ONLY ability  they does damage in human form. but it is still pretty damn easy to work around his wall with the large cooldown he has on it


Edit: i think the is the first thread i saying nid is too weak in some way that i have ever downvoted...

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q8NP7heH,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-07-27T21:22:37.026+0000)
>
> Nid's W does damage?

phh... not really

40/80/120/160/200 (+20% AP) 
on an ability that takes 2 seconds to arm and needs to be STEPPED on... and you level LAST, so no second point until lvl 13

its quite literally the WORST ability in the game in its current state.

i don't want to turn this into another tread about her traps being worthless.
but.. they really ARE worthless. especially when you consider you can use that mana or your heal and your spear.
Windwall creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles. Nidalee's spears are enemy projectiles.
I always forget it doesn't block "rays", such as Vel Koz and Thresh aa.

as weird as it feels  to have the wall block a projectile made out of something solid, its still how its suppose to work. What really feels weird is having the wind wall block {{champion:74}} or {{champion:26}}  grenades.
how the hell did i get downvoted saying EXACTLY the same thing as everyone else? my god people. do u even READ?
